src:
Deretan Hal Unik Serta Aneh yang Mungkin Cuma Ada di Sepak Bola Indonesia (Part 2)
05 Nov 2019, 09:11 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sepak bola Indonesia selalu menghadirkan cerita yang unik dan menarik untuk diulas. Entah itu di lapangan, maupun di luar lapangan.
Selain menghadapi jadwal kickoff kompetisi yang sulit ditebak, penundaan jadwal yang bisa terjadi sewaktu-waktu, hingga fenomena tim musafir, masih banyak sisi lain yang menarik digali.
Ada fenomena beberapa klub yang ganti nama, lika-liku suporter dalam mendukung tim kesayangan di tempat-tempat jauh hingga tradisi turnamen antarkampung. Hal-hal seperti itu kadangkala sulit ditemui di negara-negara lain, alias hanya ada di Indonesia.
Femomena tarkam misalnya. Beberapa orang di Indonesia rela merogoh kocek dalam-dalam demi membawa timnya ikut turnamen tarkam dengan menggaet-menggaet pemain yang berstatus profesional, dan tentu saja berbanderol mahal.
Manuver mereka mungkin terasa aneh bagi orang-orang awam. Alasannya, apa manfaatnya mengeluarkan uang sebanyak mungkin padahal hadiah turnamen sangat kecil? Bagi mereka, keuntungan bukan lah segalanya. Itulah sisi unik dari sebuah turnamen antarkampung.
Berikut ini delapan hal-hal unik yang kemungkinan hanya bisa ditemui di sepak bola Indonesia.
text:
Rows of Unique and Strange Things that may only be available in Indonesian Football (Part 2)
05 Nov 2019, 09:11 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian soccer always presents a unique and interesting story to be reviewed. Whether it's in the field, or outside the field.
In addition to facing the competition kickoff schedule that is difficult to guess, schedule delays that can occur at any time, until the phenomenon of the traveler team, there are still many other interesting sides unearthed.
There is a phenomenon of several clubs that change their names, the twists and turns of supporters in supporting their favorite teams in faraway places up to the tradition of inter-village tournaments. Things like that are sometimes difficult to find in other countries, aka only in Indonesia.
Femomena tarkam for example. Some people in Indonesia are willing to spend a lot in order to bring their teams to the tournament by attracting players who are professional, and of course expensive.
Their maneuvers may feel strange to ordinary people. The reason is, what is the benefit of spending as much money as possible when the tournament prize is very small? For them, profit is not everything. That's the unique side of an inter-village tournament.
Here are eight unique things that might only be found in Indonesian football.
